content: We were talking about it internally, but haven't yet come to a conclusion
A lot of them are in the OEIS, so they will come from there, anyway. Otherwise, restrict to the ones with prize?
I think we can include those either in the OEIS dir, or some of them are also published in paper, and they could on in the Paper or Arxiv directory
The OEIS has hundreds of their conjectures, of varying quality
I find the OEIS has more papers/books on a specific conjecture than just the one. So I think using the OEIS page as entry point is better.
